column1: Little Goat Diner////Quite the wait for this place
column2: which was a little unexpected since its not as high profile as its sister Girl and the Goat.  Regardless
column3: had a specialty coffee at the cafe while we waited to be seated.  After being called
column4: we were seated in a cute booth across from the kitchen.  Tried the fish tostada which was good
column6: and the this little piggy went to china
column8: but way too heavy in my opinion.  Ordered a side too
column9: which (un?)fortunately never came since we were super full anyway. Overall
column12: but not super worth the wait.
